title: Data Visualization
text:
During my student life, I tracked the number of hours I studied in a week.
The graph below visualises my study hours from Monday to Sunday.



X-axis: Day of the week
Y-axis: Study hours (in hours)




I created this chart because I wanted to understand my study habits.
It helped me see which days I studied the most and which days I studied the least.
From the results, I realised I studied much less on weekends, so I adjusted my schedule.



I used a bar chart because it is easy to compare numerical values across categories (days of the week).

title: Data Visualization
text:
During my student life, I tracked the amount of time I spent studying across a week and visualised it using a bar chart.



X-axis: Day of the week
Y-axis: Study hours (hours)




I chose a bar chart because it is the clearest way to compare values across categories (days). It helps me quickly see which day I studied the most and which day I studied the least.



This visualization was created when I wanted to improve my study habits and time management. By looking at the chart, I realised I studied much more on weekdays than weekends, so I adjusted my schedule to make weekend studying more consistent.

title: Data Visualization
text:
Code (Quarto / R)
days <- c(“Mon”,“Tue”,“Wed”,“Thu”,“Fri”,“Sat”,“Sun”) hours <- c(2, 3, 1, 4, 2, 1, 0)
barplot(hours, names.arg = days, xlab = “Day”, ylab = “Study hours”)

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: I used ChatGPT to help me complete this assessment.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text: I used ChatGPT to help me complete this assessment.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
How it helped me
ChatGPT helped me mainly with: - fixing Quarto formatting issues (YAML and headings) - setting up GitHub Pages correctly (rendering output to docs/) - writing simple content for my website pages
For example, it helped me understand why my .qmd pages were not rendering properly and how to format them correctly.

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Benefits

Saves time when I get stuck
Gives clear explanations and examples
Helps with writing and structuring content

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
Challenges

I still need to check and test the output myself
Sometimes the suggestions only work after adjusting them to my own project

title: Reflection on the use of GenAI
text:
What I learned
I learned that GenAI is useful as a guide, but I should still understand the steps instead of copying blindly.

Overall, GenAI made building my website faster and less stressful.
